description: The chatbot said that a mushroom that hyperaccumulates arsenic can be prepared by "sautéing in butter."
title: AI Chatbot Added to Mushroom Foraging Facebook Group Immediately Gives Tips for Cooking Dangerous Mushroom

description: The Secret Service has used a technology called Locate X which uses location data harvested from ordinary apps installed on phones. Because users agreed to an opaque terms of service page, the Secret Service believes it doesn't need a warrant.
title: 'FYI. A Warrant Isn’t Needed': Secret Service Says You Agreed To Be Tracked With Location Data
